description.value:
As a standard action, you can flicker in and out of time, gaining concealment (as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.18kryvj2dfuymk9d]{Blur} spell). You can use this ability for 1 minute per oracle level that you possess per day. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

At 7th level, each time you activate this ability, you can treat it as the blink spell, though each round spent this way counts as 1 minute of your normal time flicker duration.

You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.
